Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ARN of the permission.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new permission.
Specifies whether this permission is the default for new resource shares that include resources of the associated resource type.

The type of managed permission. This can be one of the following values:    AWS_MANAGED_PERMISSION â AWS created and manages this managed permission. You can associate it with your resource shares, but you can't modify it.   CUSTOMER_MANAGED_PERMISSION â You, or another principal in your account created this managed permission. You can associate it with your resource shares and create new versions that have different permissions.
The version number for this version of the permission.
